name: Adult Dianoga
description: The dianoga can have up to seven at a time. Each tentacle can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tentacle deals no damage to the dianoga, which can extrude a replacement tentacle on its next turn. A tentacle can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 16 Strength check against it.

name: Assassin
description: If the assassin is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the assassin instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Blastromech Series, BT-1
description: If the assassin droid fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Boar-wolf
ability: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
description: If the boar-wolf takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

name: Bor Gullet
description: The bor gullet can establish a psychic link with any creature that it successfully grapples with its tentacles. Until the psychic link ends, the bor gullet can perceive everything the target senses. The target is aware that its mind is linked, and the bor gullet can terminate the link at any time (no action required). The target can use an action on its turn to attempt to break the psychic link, doing so with a successful DC 18 Intelligence saving throw. On a successful save, the target takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage. The psychic link also ends if the target and the bor gullet are more than 1 mile apart, with no consequences to the target. The bor gullet can form psychic links with up to ten creatures at a time.

name: Cantina Brawl
description: As a bonus action, the cantina brawl imbibes nearby alcohol to gain access to a hidden reservoir of audacity and grit. The cantina brawl gains 7 (2d6) temporary hp for 1 minute.

name: Captain
ability: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

name: Cyborg Khagan
description: If Cyborg Khagan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Cyborg Khagan
description: When a creature is forced to make a Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration due to taking damage from the cyborg khagan, the DC for the check equals 10 or the full damage taken, whichever number is higher, instead of only half.

name: Dark Lord Spirit
description: If the dark lord spirit fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Dark Lord Spirit
description:
The dark lord spirit's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: *coerce mind*, *fear*, *improved feedback*, *sense force*, *sever force*
1/day each: *dominate monster*, *improved force camouflage*, *mass animation*
3/day each: *darkness*, *dominate mind*, *force project*, *force suppression*, *sanctuary*, *telekinesis*

name: Emperor's Hand
description: If the emperor's hand fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Fexian Skullborer
description: Any creature that grapples the skullborer or otherwise comes into direct contact with the skullborerâ€™s skin must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

name: Force Storm Eye
description: If the force storm eye fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Force Storm Eye
description: (Costs 2 Actions). The eye can cause a bolt of lightning to strike a point anywhere under its storm. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much sonic damage on a successful one.

name: Force Storm Eye
description: (Costs 3 Actions). The eye releases a blast of thunder and wind in a line that is 1 mile long and 20 feet wide. Objects in that area take 22 (4d10) sonic damage. Each creature there must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) sonic damage and be flung up to 60 feet in a direction away from the line. If a thrown target collides with immovable object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) kinetic damage for every 10 feet it was thrown before impact. If the target would collide with another creature instead, that other creature must succeed on a DC19 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

name: Forest Nexu, Adult
description: If the nexu is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Forest Nexu, Adult
description: If the nexu moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the nexu can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

name: Geejaw
description: The geejaw can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

name: Gonk Droid
description: When the Gonk droid is reduced to zero hit points, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Gorax
description: Any creature other than a gorax that starts its turn within 10 feet of the gorax must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creatureâ€™s next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any gorax for 1 hour.

name: Grand Admiral
description: When the Grand Admiral makes a saving throw against illusions or to resist charm and fear effects, it may add its Intelligence modifier (8) to the roll.

name: Grand Admiral
description:
The Grand Admiral's techcasting ability is Intelligence (tech save DC 23, +15 to hit with techattacks). The Grand Admiral innately knows the followingtech powers:
At-will: assess the situation, analyze, decryption program, detect enhancement, spot the weakness, detect invisibility, detect traps
3/day each: element of surprise, explosion, tactical advantage, ballistic shield, salvo, friendly fire, greater analyze
1/day each: contingency, find the path, tactical superiority, stun, predictive AI

name: Grand Admiral
description: For 1 minute, the Grand Admiral can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Grand Admiral. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the Grand Admiral is incapacitated.

name: Grand Admiral
description: If the grand admiral fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: HK-47 Assassin Droid
description: If the assassin droid fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Trooper, Heavy Assault
description: When a target creature rolls a 1 on the saving throw against the rotary cannon's burst or rapid attack, they instead take full damage (12 and 22, respectively).

name: Hutt Crime Lord
description: During this time Hutt Crime Lord can use its reaction to force the creature to use the creatureâ€™s reaction. As a bonus action, Hutt Crime Lord can call out to a humanoid who can understand it that is charmed by it or frightened of it to direct their next action. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 16). On a failed save, until the end of Hutt Crime Lordâ€™s next turn, the creature takes only the actions Hutt Crime Lord chooses, and doesnâ€™t do anything that it doesnâ€™t allow it to do.

name: Hutt Crime Lord
description: When Hutt Crime Lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: IG-88 Assassin Droid
description: The assassin droid cannot allow itself to be captured. When bloodied, it can choose to self-destruct with an implanted thermal detonator. Each creature within 20 feet must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d6 fire and 2d10 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much as on a successful one. Additionally, on a failed save, the creature is knocked prone.

name: ISB Infiltrator
description: If the ISB Infiltrator is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the ISB Infiltrator instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Imperial Royal Guard
description: As a bonus action, the Imperial Royal Guard can engage in a dizzying maneuver with a whirling pike, causing every hostile creature within 10 feet to make a Strength Saving Throw (DC 17) or be knocked prone.

name: Jubba Bird
description: At-will: The jubba bird innately knows the following force powers: sense emotions The jubba birdâ€™s forcecasting ability is Wisdom (power save DC 12, +4 to hit with force attacks).

name: Katarn
description: If the katarn drops on a target from above and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) kinetic damage per 10 feet fallen, up to 21 (6d6). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the katarn misses, it takes half normal falling damage.

name: Kolkpravis Baatar
ability: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

name: Kolkpravis Khagan
ability: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

name: Kolkpravis Khan
ability: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

name: Krayt Dragon, Adult
description: The dragon makes a claw attack. If the attack hits, the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet in a straight line away from the dragon. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target falls prone.

name: Krayt Dragon, Greater
description: The greater krayt dragon dives into the ground, sand blasting all creatures around it. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) kinetic damage and be knocked prone. The greater krayt dragon is now burrowed.

name: LOM Series Protocol Droid
description: If the droid fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Maalraas
description: At-will: force camouflage The maalraasâ€™s force casting ability is Wisdom (power save DC 11, +3 to hit with force attacks). The maalraas innately knows the following force powers:

name: Manifestation of Abeloth
description:
Abelothâ€™s forceasting ability is Charisma (force save DC 23). Abeloth can innately cast the following force powers:
At will: coerce mind, sense force
3/day each: fear, force suppression, telekinesis
1/day each: telekinetic wave, force lightning cone

name: Manifestation of Abeloth
description: If the manifestation of abeloth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Mistryl Prime
description:
The Mistryl is a 5th level tech caster (tech save DC 13, +5 to hit with power attacks, 22 tech points). The Mistryl knows the following powers.
At Will: encrypted message, light, poison spray
1st Level: alarm, decryption program, holographic disguise
2nd Level: concealed caltrops, infiltrate, paralyze humanoid
3rd Level: invisibility to cameras, tactical advantage

name: Mistryl Prime
description: As a bonus action, the Mistryl Prime can make a Lightwhip attack at disadvantage. If the attack hits, deal damage as normal, and the hit creature must make a Strength saving throw (DC 16) or be knocked prone.

name: Nuna
ability: Inflate (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
description: As a bonus action, the nuna increases in size for 1 minute. Anything it is wearing or carrying does not increase in size. While inflated, the nuna is Small, doubles its damage dice on attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Charisma (Intimidation) checks with advantage. If the nuna lacks the room to become Small, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

name: Rakghoul
description: If the rakghoul moves at least 20 feet toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the rakghoul can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

name: Rakghoul, Hulking
description: If the rakghoul moves at least 20 feet toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the rakghoul can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

name: Rathtar, Dwarf
description: The rathtar can have up to eight arms at a time. Each arm can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying an arm deals no damage to the rathtar, which can extrude a replacement arm on its next turn. An arm can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 15 Strength check against it.

name: Sando Aqua Monster
description: If the sando aqua monster fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Sando Aqua Monster
description: A creature must make a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw the first time on a turn that it enters the whirlpool or that the whirlpool enters its space, including when the whirlpool first appears. A creature takes 6d8 kinetic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. In addition, a Large or smaller creature that fails the save must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or become restrained in the whirlpool until the power ends. When a creature starts its turn restrained by the whirlpool, the creature is pulled 5 feet deeper inside it, unless the creature is at the bottom. A restrained creature moves with the whirlpool and is submerged when the effect ends, unless the creature has some means to stay afloat. A restrained creature can use an action to make a DC 21 Strength or Dexterity check. If successful, the creature is no longer restrained by the whirlpool and is hurled 3d6x10 feet away from it in a random direction. The whirlpool ends at the beginning of the monster's turn unless the monster used the Whirlpool legendary action to maintain the whirlpool. The monster creates a whirlpool in the water at a point within 30 feet that it can see. The whirlwind is a 10-foot-radius, 30-foot-deep cylinder centered on that point. On subsequent turns, the monster can use the Whirlpool legendary action to maintain and move the whirlpool up to 30 feet in any direction along the surface of the water. The whirlpool sucks up any medium or smaller objects that aren't secured to anything and that aren't worn or carried by anyone.

name: Sarlacc, Adult
description: If the sarlacc, adult fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Sarlacc, Adult
description: The sarlacc can have up to eight tentacles at a time. Each tentacle can be attacked (AC 18; 40 hit points; immunity to psychic damage). A tentacle can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a DC 22 Strength check against it. Destroying a tentacle in either way deals no damage to the sarlacc, which can extrude a replacement tentacle on its next turn, but it causes the sarlacc to spend a legendary action for no effect. If the sarlacc has no legendary actions remaining this turn to spend, the sarlacc regains one fewer spent legendary actions at the start of its next turn than it would otherwise regain. The sarlacc can be forced to spend no more than two legendary actions in this way.

name: Sarlacc, Adult
description: The sarlacc sends a shockwave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 round. Each creature on the ground in the area must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 41 (6d10 + 8) sonic damage and is knocked prone on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not knocked prone on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is pulled 15 feet downwards and towards the sarlacc.

name: Trooper, Sergeant
ability: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest).

name: Super Tactical Droid
description: If the super tactical droid fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Super Tactical Droid
description: When the tactical droid casts a tech power that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the power and to succeed on the required saving throw.

name: Swamp Slug
description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the slug must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 9 (2d8) poison damage.

name: Swamp Wampa
description: The wampa has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks. At the start of each wampas turns, each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (4d4) poison damage.

name: T-Series Tactical Droid
description: Innate Tech-casting. The T-series Tactical droid can innately cast the following tech powers (tech save DC 14): assess the situation, encrypted message, on/off, alarm, element of surprise (3/day), repair droid, stack the deck

name: Trandoshan Huntmaster
ability: Leadership (Recharges after a short or long rest)

name: Trandoshan T'Doshok
description: If the Trandoshan T'doshok fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Trooper, Captain
ability: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
description: The Trooper Captain can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the Trooper Captain. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time.

name: Trooper, Mounted
ability: Flamethrower (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

name: Vessel of Abeloth
description: If the vessel of abeloth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: War Wyrm
description: If the war wyrm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: War Wyrm
description: The wyrm lashes out and scatters a dusty wake. Each creature within 10 feet of the wyrm, including around a corner, must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the wyrm's next turn. A creature that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to this effect until the end of the wyrm's next turn.

name: Weaponized Gonk Droid
description: When the Gonk droid is reduced to zero hit points, it explodes. Each creature within 20 feet of it must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 6d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Wookiee Engineer
description:
Tech Casting. The wookiee engineer is a 5th level tech caster (tech save DC 13, + 5 to hit with tech attacks). The wookiee engineer has 23 tech points and knows the following tech powers:
At will: electrical burst, mending, on/off
1st level: element of surprise, kolto pack, repair droid
2nd level: hold droid, overheat
3rd level: enhance weapon, fabricate trap

name: Purge Trooper, Electrovoulge
description:
The purge trooper, electrovoulge's spellcasting ability is Strength (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: *saber reflect*, *saber ward*

name: Zombie, Trooper
description: If damage reduces the zombie, trooper to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is fire or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie, trooper drops to 1 hit point instead.

name: Trooper, Engineer
description:
The trooper, engineer's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: *overheat*, *paralyze humanoid*, *shocking ray*
3/day each: *energy shield*, *kolto pack*

name: Trooper, Rocket Assault
description: When a creature rolls a 1 on the saving throw against the trooper's rocket, they treat the effectâ€™s damage as if it had rolled the maximum (20 for fragmentation and 12 for ion).

name: AT-ED
description: If the AT-ED is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: AT-ED
description:
The AT-ED is a 3rd-level techcaster. Its techcasting ability is Intelligence (tech save DC 14, +6 to hit with tech powers, 10 tech points). It knows the following tech powers:

At-will: *assess the situation*, *itemize*
1st level: *analyze*, *expeditious retreat*, *gleaming outline*, *spot the weakness*, *target lock*
2nd level: *detect traps*, *frequency scan*, *motivator boost*

name: E-XD-Series Infiltrator Droid
description: If the droid is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: E-XD-Series Infiltrator Droid
description: When the E-XD droid is reduced to zero hit points, it begins a countdown, and at the end of the initiative order on the following turn, it explodes. Each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) Energy damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: E-XD-Series Infiltrator Droid
description:
The E-XD is an 18th-level techcaster. Its techcasting ability is Intelligence (tech save DC 16, +8 to hit with tech powers, 23 tech points). It knows the following tech powers:

At-will: *assess the situation, itemize, mending, on/off*
1st level: *analyze, copy, countermeasures, decryption program, expeditious retreat, gleaming outline, preparedness, repair droid, spot the weakness, target lock*
2nd level: *detect traps, enhance droid, frequency scan, motivator boost, release, smuggle*
3rd level: *invisibility to cameras, read memory*
4th level: *scan area, synchronicity*
5th level: *greater analyze, override interface, skill protocol*

name: Trooper, Technician
description:
The trooper, technician's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: *assess the situation*, *ion blast*, *on/off*, *reboot*, *short circuit*
2/day each: *kolto pack*, *spot the weakness*

name: Trooper, EVO
description: When the trooper would make a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, it can choose to make a Constitution saving throw instead.

name: Dark Trooper, Phase 0
description: As a bonus action, the Phase Zero Dark Trooper can move double its movement speed, ignoring difficult terrain.

name: Cultist, Saber
description: As a bonus action, the cultist picks one creature it can see. The creature must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or move fifteen feet closer to the cultist. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

name: Cultist, Lifeweaver
description:
The cultist, lifeweaver's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
2/day: *siphon life*
3/day each: *drain life*, *share life*

name: Cultist, Electromancer
description:
The cultist, electromancer's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day: *force chain lightning*
3/day each: *force lightning*, *kinetite*

name: Cultist, Rifleman
description: As a bonus action, the cultist picks one creature it can see. The creature must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or move fifteen feet closer to the cultist. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks.

name: Cultist, Bonebreaker
description:
The cultist, bonebreaker's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day: *crush*
2/day: *choke*
3/day each: *convulsion*, *tremor*

name: Cultist, Master
description:
The cultist, master's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: *chain lightning*, *crush*, *siphon life*
3/day each: *choke*, *drain life*, *force lightning*, *share life*

name: Roggwart
description:
The roggwart's innate spellcasting ability is Strength (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

2/day: *pressure crush*

name: Dark Disciple
description: If the dark disciple fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Dark Disciple
description: If the dark disciple is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Dark Disciple
description:
The dark disciple's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: *improved force intuition*, *telekinetic shield*
2/day: *force repulse*
3/day each: *force reflect*, *force throw*, *sever force*

name: Puppeted Dark Disciple
description: If the dark disciple fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Puppeted Dark Disciple
description: If the dark disciple is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Puppeted Dark Disciple
description:
The puppeted dark disciple's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: *crush*, *greater kinetite*, *improved force intuition*, *improved force scream*, *siphon life*, *telekinetic shield*, *wrack*
2/day: *force repulse*
3/day each: *force reflect*, *force throw*, *sever force*

name: Spirit of Marka Ragnos
description: If the dark lord spirit fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Spirit of Marka Ragnos
description:
The spirit of marka ragnos's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20, +13 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: *coerce mind*, *fear*, *improved feedback*, *sense force*, *sever force*
1/day each: *dominate monster*, *improved force camouflage*, *mass animation*
3/day each: *darkness*, *dominate mind*, *force lightning*, *force project*, *force suppression*, *sanctuary*, *telekinesis*

name: Jedi Redeemer
description: If the Jedi Redeemer fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Jedi Redeemer
description:
The jedi redeemer's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 21, +13 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: *force disarm*, *force push/pull*, *mind trick*, *saber reflect*, *saber throw*
1/day each: *crush*, *dominate mind*, *mass coerce mind*, *master speed*, *stasis*, *telekinesis*, *telekinetic burst*
2/day each: *choke*, *dominate beast*, *force immunity*, *freedom of movement*, *knight speed*, *telekinetic storm*
3/day each: *calm emotions*, *cloud mind*, *coerce mind*, *force confusion*, *force jump*, *force propel*, *force throw*, *slow descent*, *stun*

name: Galactic Senator
description: As a bonus action, the Senator can grant an ally a +7 bonus that can be applied to the next attack roll, ability check, or saving throw that the target makes.

name: Galactic Senator
description: When the Galactic Senator fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

name: Galactic Senator
description: When the Galactic Senator hits a creature with a weapon attack, she can use her reaction to issue a one-word command to a creature who can see or hear her. Add 1d10 to the attackâ€™s damage roll, and the target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target must follow the command on its next turn.

name: Legendary Corellian Smuggler
description: When the Smuggler fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

name: Legendary Corellian Smuggler
description: If the Smuggler is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Legendary Corellian Smuggler
description:
The legendary corellian smuggler is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, 8 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): *assess the situation, combustive shot, encrypted message*
1st level (4 slots): *element of surprise, flash, oil slick, smoke cloud, stack the deck, target lock*
2nd level (3 slots): *charge powercell, infiltrate, mirror image, smuggle, translocate*
3rd level (3 slots): *debilitating gas, invisibility to cameras*
4th level (3 slots): *salvo*
5th level (2 slots): *mislead, override interface, shutdown*

name: Legendary Wookiee Smuggler
description: If the Legendary Wookiee Smuggler fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Stellar Legionnaire
description: If the Stellar Legionnaire is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the Stellar Legionnaire instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Stellar Legionnaire
description:
The stellar legionnaire's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
1/day each: *acid dart*, *burst of flame*, *overheat*
3/day each: *flame sweep*, *poison dart*, *ring of fire*

name: Fireteam: Stellar Legionnaire
description: If the Stellar Legionnaire is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the Stellar Legionnaire instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Fireteam: Stellar Legionnaire
description:
The fireteam: stellar legionnaire's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

name: Squad: Stellar Legionnaire
description: If the Stellar Legionnaire is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the Stellar Legionnaire instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

name: Phrik-Armored Basilisk War Droid
description: If the Phrik-Armored Basilisk War Droid fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

name: Phrik-Armored Basilisk War Droid
description: If the basilisk war droid takes damage that reduces it to 0 hit points or below, it can make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw to instead be reduced to 1. If it takes additional damage, it can repeat this save, with each additional use increasing the DC by 5.

name: Phrik-Armored Basilisk War Droid
